CC1717:
Looking for a tee that feels broken-in from day one? This heavyweight, garment-dyed style delivers a thick, structured drape while staying soft and breathable. With its relaxed fit and vintage-washed colors, it’s built for comfort, durability, and effortless everyday wear. 



- 100% ring-spun cotton

- Fabric weight: 6.1 oz/yd² (206.8 g/m²)

- Garment-dyed for unique color and softness

- Relaxed fit with a classic silhouette

- 7/8″ double-needle topstitched collar

- Twill-taped neck and shoulders for durability

- Double-needle armhole, sleeve, and bottom hems

- Blank product sourced from Honduras

This premium unisex shirt wraps you in softness with 100% combed cotton and a smooth, luxe feel. The regular fit and crew neck give it that timeless, put-together look — whether you’re dressing it up, down, or just out the door. Pre-shrunk fabric means it’ll hold its shape wash after wash, no surprises.



- Regular unisex fit  

- 100% combed cotton (Marles color is 85% cotton / 15% viscose)

- Yarn diameter: 28 singles  

- Side-seamed construction for a retail-quality finish  

- Double-needle topstitch on sleeves and hem

SS_SATU001:
Timeless. Comfortable. Consciously made.


This unisex staple is crafted from 100% GOTS- and OCS-certified organic cotton, grown and processed without harmful chemicals. The result is a tee that feels soft yet substantial, drapes beautifully, and stands the test of time — while leaving a lighter footprint on the planet.


The ribbed collar adds a subtle sporty edge, while the regular fit keeps it effortlessly wearable. Better for you, better for the earth — this is your go-to premium organic tee.



- 
Regular unisex fit




- 
100% organic combed ring-spun cotton (GOTS + OCS certified)




- 
Midweight feel (5.3 oz/yd²)




- 
Set-in sleeves for structure




- 
Ribbed 1x1 collar for shape retention




- 
Double-needle topstitch on sleeves and hem




- 
Self-fabric neck tape on the inside back




- 
Ethically sourced blank from Bangladesh





Soft on your skin. Lighter on the planet. Made to do better.
